Kill The Wumpus

Testing that when user shoots arrow in direction of Wumpus, Wumpus dies.

Input Map:
|Start|Direction|End|
|1|E|2|
|2|E|Wumpus|

|put user at 1|
|shoot arrow East|
|check message appears saying "Empty cavern, arrow continues East."|
|check message appears saying "User killed the Wumpus."|

|put user at 2|
|shoot arrow East|
|check message appears saying "User killed the Wumpus."|
